# [Interview #1156: Calamity-Houston, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1156#4)

#### Cadmium

Does a Connection medallion account for heavy sarcasm?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It would. Maybe not the heaviest, most deadpan sarcasm.
